title: Khloe Kardashian admits she MISSES ex Lamar Odom 'all the time' and would like to meet with him
text:
Their divorce was finalized in 2016 after many trials and tribulations.

And Khloe Kardashian proved that there will always be a special part in her heart for Lamar Odom.

The 35-year-old reality star admitted that she misses her 39-year-old professional basketball player ex-husband 'all the time' in a new clip from the next episode of Keeping Up With The Kardashians released on Thursday.

Interesting: Khloe Kardashian admitted that she misses ex-husband Lamar Odom 'all the time' in a new clip from the next episode of Keeping Up With The Kardashians released on Thursday

Better days: The now 35-year-old reality star and now 39-year-old professional basketball player (seen in Burbank, California back in March 2010) officially divorced in 2016

The youngest Kardashian sister could be seen chatting it up with older sisters Kim, 39, and 40-year-old Kourtney as she makes the admission saying: 'I like miss him all the time but not in a place where I would like to get back with him.

'So, he called me and he was like, "I just knew we were all gonna talk again at some point. I'm just so happy."'

She went on to say that Lamar was keen on meeting up face-to-face to catch up.

Support system: The youngest Kardashian sister could be seen chatting it up with older sisters Kim, 39, and 40-year-old Kourtney as she makes the admission

Revealing: She said: 'I like miss him all the time but not in a place where I would like to get back with him'

All eyes on her: She went on to say that Lamar was keen on meeting up face-to-face to catch up

In her corner: Kim was supportive of her sister and Lamar's potential rendezvous and thought it would be a great opportunity to lay their cards on the table

Khloe explained: 'He was like, "I would love to see you. I've been dying to see you in person. I just feel like we have so much to talk about."'

Kim was supportive of her sister and Lamar's potential rendezvous and thought it would be a great opportunity to lay their cards on the table.

The Good American Jeans founder responded: 'I always felt after, I think this overdose, that I did everything in my power to be there through sickness and health.

'Once I saw that he, you know, wasn't in the headspace to really want to change his bad situation then I was fine letting him go.'

Genesis: Khloe and Lamar met at a party on August 26, 2009, and within two days they were joined at the hip, as they are seen here September 2009 in Westwood, California

Khloe and Lamar met at a party on August 26, 2009, and within two days they were joined at the hip.

'They're very, very happy. They're literally inseparable. Khloe thinks he's amazing, and he makes her laugh and smile constantly,' Kim told People at the time.

And they made their happiness official on September 27, 2009, marrying in a Keeping Up With The Kardashians special, nine days after getting engaged.

Happier days: They made their happiness official on September 27, 2009, marrying in a Keeping Up With The Kardashians special, nine days after getting engaged

The pair continued to show their love for the cameras, appearing on the reality show as well as their own spin-off for two seasons.

But things turned for the worse in the second half of 2013, when the NBA star was hit with cheating accusations and a DUI before entering rehab.

Khloe filed for divorce in December of that year.

While they were legally separated, Lamar was rushed to hospital after he was found unconscious in a Nevada brothel following a near-fatal overdose.

Ouch: Things turned for the worse in the second half of 2013, when the NBA star was hit with cheating accusations and a DUI before entering rehab, as they are seen together in April 2012

Khloe flew to his side and stayed right there for the next few months, even calling off their protracted divorce proceedings. She was the one making all his medical decisions.

Lamar was forced to learn how to do everything again, including walk, but had reportedly fallen back into his dangerous habits by in early 2016.

Khloe filed for divorce for a second time in May 2016 and the proceedings were finalized in December that year.

The youngest Kardashian daughter began dating her future baby-daddy, Tristan Thompson, in September 2016, before announcing they were pregnant the following year.

Back in the day: Lamar and Khloe seen together in Orange, California back in June 2012

Khloe welcomed daughter True Thompson into the world on April 12, 2018, just days after learning Tristan had been unfaithful to her.

While the pair worked on the relationship for the next nine months, things became unstuck once again in February 2019, when Tristan was caught out kissing sister Kylie Jenner's best friend, Jordyn Woods, at a house party.

Tristan and Khloe split almost immediately after.

Lamar also since moved on after their divorce, currently dating personal trainer, Sabrina Parr.

Keeping Up With The Kardashians airs Sunday nights at 9pm on E!
